entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
